FuncDef: The reset y1731 statistic-type command resets the statistics on one-way frame delay, two-way frame delay, single-ended frame loss, single-synthetic-loss and dual-ended frame loss.
CLIs: reset y1731 statistic-type { dual-loss | single-loss | oneway-delay | twoway-delay | single-synthetic-loss } [ test-id <test-id-value> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Resets the statistics about single-ended frame loss.
-

Resets the statistics on two-way frame delay.
-

Resets the statistics on one-way frame delay.
-

Clears statistics about a specified test instance.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Resets the statistics about dual-ended frame loss.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To obtain Y.1731 statistics within a specified period of time, run the reset y1731 statistic-type command to clear the current Y.1731 statistics. After the period of time, run the display y1731 statistic-type command to view statistics.
Prerequisites
The specified MA exists.
Configuration Impact
Running this command clears all Y.1731 statistics, and the cleared Y.1731 statistics cannot be restored. Exercise caution when running this command.
